Record.ClassificationPath: Hemic and Lymphatic Diseases/Hematologic Diseases/Leukocyte Disorders/Leukopenia/Lymphopenia/T-Lymphocytopenia, Idiopathic CD4-Positive
Immune System Diseases/Immunologic Deficiency Syndromes/Lymphopenia/T-Lymphocytopenia, Idiopathic CD4-Positive
Record.Description: Reproducible depletion of CD4+ lymphocytes below 300 per cubic millimeter in the absence of HIV infection or other known causes of immunodeficiency. This is a rare, heterogeneous syndrome and does not appear to be caused by a transmissible agent.
